snippet: Nashville suspended two forwards for the third game of its playoff series with Phoenix, then kept them out of Game 4.
abstract: Nashville suspended two forwards for the third game of its playoff series with Phoenix, then kept them out of Game 4.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and STU HACKEL

headline.main: Predators Try to Cope With Two Stars on the Bench
headline.print_headline: Predators Try to Cope With Stars On Bench
